Helper function to add resources to the resource Tree during server initialization.

  • resource – the actual resource to create

True, if successful

notify(node)[source]¶

Finds the observers that must be notified about the update of the observed resource and invoke the notification procedure in different threads.

Parameters:node (coapthon2.utils.Tree) – the node which has the deleted resource
notify_deletion(node)[source]¶

Finds the observers that must be notified about the delete of the observed resource and invoke the notification procedure in different threads.

Parameters:node (coapthon2.utils.Tree) – the node which has the deleted resource

purge_mids()[source]¶

Delete messages which has been stored for more than EXCHANGE_LIFETIME. Executed in a thread.

retransmit(t)[source]¶

Retransmit the message and schedule retransmission for future if MAX_RETRANSMIT limit is not already reached.

Parameters:t – ((Response, Resource), host, port, future_time) or (Response, host, port, future_time)

update_relations(node, resource)[source]¶

Update a relation. It is used when a resource change due a POST request, without changing its path.

Parameters:
